Please refer to rental car options below and call us to discuss other car categories 12 Day/11 Night Highlands & Islands Self-Drive Explore the breathtaking landscapes in the Highlands and the spectacular Scottish Islands in this incredible 12 day self-drive tour. Drive along some of the most dramatic coastal scenery in Britain and visit iconic landmarks like Eilean Donan Castle. Visit Glencoe, one of the most famous glens in Scotland and stop in at some whisky distilleries in Speyside. Discover the stunning Glamis Castle before ending the tour in Edinburgh.
